nodes.text: The Nebulon-K was a model of frigate introduced around the year 31 ABY.[source?] They were equipped with turbolasers and hyperdrives, but had problems with their combustion-shielding. Nebulon-Ks were used as capital ships by the First Order Navy and could carry a flight of TIE fighters on moorings.
A Nebulon-K was among the First Order starships sent to the Uvoss system after receiving a distress signal from the Hevurion Grace, the personal yacht of First Order-aligned Senator Erudo Ro-Kiintor.
The Nebulon-K first appeared in the 2015 young readers novel Before the Awakening, written by Greg Rucka.
